Most Illustrious Sir

Regarding the content of your official letter dated the 4th of the current month, the Government commands to declare to you that when it gave order to Captain Pedro Rodrigues de Quevedo to arrange for slaves and promote the tannery under his charge, it was under the persuasion that such establishment was outside the district entrusted to Your Lordship.

May God keep Your Lordship

Secretary of State for Hacienda Affairs, Piratini, April 11, 1838. Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter of the Most Excellent, April 11, received on the 19th of the same. Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Commander of the Police of the Boqueirão District.
